jarvis_projects.description: Primary scripts were developed using the "Bash" scripting language. It uses the bash script to create the docker container in order to set up a postgres psql instance. Two bash scripts, host_info.sh collects the hardware information and host_usage collects the data regarding the maemory and cpu usage and monitors resource usage every minute using crontab. These scripts are use to add the dats into database using ddl.sql file.
jarvis_projects.name: Linux Cluster Resource Monitoring App

jarvis_projects.description: Performed data analysis on transaction data submitted by LGS to assist the marketing team in finding the answers to commercial queries so that the company's income may be increased utilising RFM report.Python was utilised for the study together with libraries like pandas, numPy, scipy, and seaborn in a Jupyter notebook. The company's data warehouse, Postgres, was operated via a Docker container.
jarvis_projects.name: Python Data Analytics

summary: An aspiring PG graduate in Information Technology and Business Analysis and administrative expert with 4+ years of experience in the information technology, service industries, and Cosmetic Industries. Experienced in Customer and Client Services, Project Management, Quality Analysis, and Marketing, including Digital Marketing, and an enthusiastic learner understanding business and information technology. I am currently working as a BSA at Jarvis Consulting Group, where I am learning about standard technologies as well as numerous tools and methodologies for data analysis. I can also use my technological skills on a regular basis in a variety of fields, including  SQL, Linux, and others.
